Generation VIII.Sword: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
